articles.title: Raoul Moat's best pal tells of heartache 10 years on from manhunt - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Tony Laidler opens up about loyal friend who became Britain's most wanted murderer a decade ago
articles.content:
His best mate is known across the world as the crazed gunman who sparked Britain's biggest manhunt.
But 10 years on from Raoul Moat's death Tony Laidler will be remembering an entirely different sid… [+4740 chars]

articles.title: Funeral held for 'Forces' Sweetheart' Dame Vera Lynn - BBC News
articles.description: The streets were lined with people wanting to pay their respects, while two Spitfires flew past.
